data.prayer: Father, we ask for 416 new simple churches in the state of Gelderland, Netherlands. Place a simple church in every community of the 2,080,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gelderland, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 83,496 believers in Gelderland to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Gelderland, Netherlands.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Gelderland to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, help the 83,496 believers in Gelderland to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Turk people. Make the Turk people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Gelderland, Netherlands to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Gelderland to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, remind your church in Gelderland that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

location.name: Gelderland
location.people_groups_list: Javanese, Indonesian, Sarnami Hindi, Javanese, Caribbean, Dutch
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Javanese (35,000), Indonesian (12,000), Sarnami Hindi (145,000), Javanese, Caribbean (8,800), Dutch (14,025,000)
